General.Name: Shandong Hi-Speed Road&Bridge
General.Description: Shandong Hi-Speed Road&Bridge Group Co., Ltd. engages in the general contracting business in China and internationally. It is involved in the general contracting for road and municipal, water conservancy and hydropower, electric power, port, aviation, railway, and electromechanical construction; professional construction contracting for roadbeds, road surfaces, bridges, tunnels, and steel structures; maintenance project, railway engineering, housing construction project, tunnel engineering, harbor engineering, overseas project, equipment manufacturing, and design consultation activities. The company was formerly known as Shandong Hi-Speed Road & Bridge Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Hi-Speed Road&Bridge Group Co., Ltd. in January 2021. The company was founded in 1948 and is based in Jinan, China.
